alert.note: Alert for Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 09 at 3:16AM AKST until January 09 at 12:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON AKST TODAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 12 inches with highest amounts in Port Alexander. Lowest snow totals in Sitka where a change over to rain has already occurred. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph at Sitka. * WHERE...Port Alexander. * WHEN...Until noon AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Ponding could develop after a changeover to rain. A change to all rain is expected on Sunday at Port Alexander. Sitka has already changed to rain. There is a chance of freezing rain before the change over.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.

area.areaDesc: Cape Decision to Salisbury Sound Coastal Area
